translation: It is not born, nor does it ever die; after having been, it again does not cease to be; unborn, eternal, changeless, and ancient, it is not killed when the body is killed.
commentary: 2.20 Not not? Many is born? dies dies? or or? Maybe at any time? Not not? Ayam this (Self)? being having been? will be will be? or or? Not not? Bhuyah (any) more? Ajah unborn? Eternal eternal? Eternally changeless? This is this? Purana: ancient? Not not? is killed is killed? being killed being killed? Sharire in body.Commentary This Self (Atman) is destitute of the six types of transformation or BhavaVikaras such as birth?
